word_mean: 又称：柄(manubrium (多毛类), petiole(蜘蛛))
蒂，花梗：类似足的部分，尤指肾小球足细胞之间犬牙交错的二级突起

sentence.Network_en: Implicit the first cystic inflorescence, was born the axil, no pedicel.
sentence.Network_cn: 隐头花序囊状, 对生于叶腋间, 无花梗.

sentence.Network_en: A supporting stalk, such as a peduncle or pedicel.
sentence.Network_cn: 叶梗支撑的梗, 如花梗或小花梗.

sentence.Network_en: Method: A retroauricular groove flap with pedicel was designed to reconstruct retroauricular groove.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法: 利用残耳或多余皮肤设计带蒂的耳后沟皮瓣修复耳后沟.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 花梗（Pedicel）是连接花与花序主茎之间的短柄。一个花梗上可具有多朵花。
2. 梗节（Pedicel） 是触角的第二节，较细小，里面常具有感觉器官，称江氏器。如在雄蚊中是听觉器官。
...cence)：花于花枝上之排列顺序，花有小柄者曰小花柄(pedicel)小花生柄着生于花轴(rachis)，未着生花之花轴下部曰花梗(peduncle)。
地质学专业词汇中英翻译(9) ... 小荷尔虫 Hollinella 小花梗 pedicel 小环礁 faro.

list.abs: pedicel absent ; bracteole 1 , at base of flower .花梗无小苞片1，花的在基部。
Stems and pedicels glabrous . Sepals dark purple , glabrous or abaxially sparsely puberulent ., 茎和花梗无毛 . 萼片深紫色 , 无毛的或背面疏生微柔毛.
Flowers bisexual , zygomorphic , shortly pedicellate , in racemes or panicles , axillary or terminal ;, 花两性 , 左右对称 , 有短花梗 , 在总状花序或圆锥花序 , 腋生或顶生里;

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from modern Latin pedicellus 'small foot', diminutive of pes, ped- 'foot'

means.word_mean: 1. a small stalk bearing a single flower of an inflorescence; an ultimate division of a common peduncle
